pr_title: Added documentation for p2, osgi and local repo

timeline.bodyText: Removing this hardly seems worth a major package bump. Perhaps just mark it deprecated instead. And you don't need to document it in the docs page.
timeline.author: bjhargrave
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,10 +32,4 @@
 	 */
 	String location(String string);
 
-	/**
-	 * If not set or false, this assumes a P2 repository, i.e. the url points to
-	 * a P2 repository directory. If set to true, the url is assumed to point to
-	 * an Eclipse Target platform.
-	 */
-	boolean targetPlatform();

replies.bodyText: We could deprecate it, but for how long should it stay in there? I've needed to bump the Version this hard, because baselining complained about it.
replies.author: juergen-albert

replies.bodyText: It is complaining because you deleted the method from an interface in an exported package :-). So don't delete it. Just mark it deprecated and comment that it is unused. There is little harm in leaving the method in place.
replies.author: bjhargrave
